availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hardin County, Kentucky, farmer and public servant. Kentucky native. Married to Ann Catherine Stuart. Father of John Alexander Stuart, Barbara Elizabeth Stuart Connelly, and Elmira C. Stuart. Farmer in Hardin County in 1860. Assessor of revenue for Hardin County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hardin County, District 1, p. 145.
KYR-0002-022-0039.
Find A Grave, "John Stuart (1826-1894)," Memorial #89350251, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/89350251 (accessed December 30, 2019).
